inclusion.criterion: Severe aortic stenosis with planned aortic valve replacement
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Planned non-aortic valve cardiac or elective ascending aorta surgery
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Coexistent severe aortic or mitral regurgitation
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Coexistent mitral stenosis greater than mild in severity
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Acute valvular heart disease (e.g. acute mitral regurgitation or endocarditis)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Acute pulmonary oedema or cardiogenic shock
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has severe aortic stenosis with planned aortic valve replacement, meets inclusion criteria. No exclusion criteria met.
